SELECT MP.MV_PPL_ID , MP.PRFL_PCTR , MP.NM , MP.RL_NM , TO_CHAR(MP.CRT_DT ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CRT_DT , MP.CRTR , TO_CHAR(MP.MDFY_DT ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MDFY_DT , MP.MDFYR , MP.USE_YN , MP.DEL_YN , CRTR_M.MBR_NM CRTR_MBR_NM , MDFYR_M.MBR_NM MDFYR_MBR_NM FROM MV_PPL MP INNER JOIN MBR CRTR_M ON MP.CRTR = CRTR_M.MBR_ID INNER JOIN MBR MDFYR_M ON MP.MDFYR = MDFYR_M.MBR_ID WHERE MP.DEL_YN = 'N' AND MP.CRT_DT >= TO_DATE(#{startDt} || ' 00:00:00' ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND MP.CRT_DT <= TO_DATE(#{endDt} || ' 23:59:59' ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') /* 파라미터 체크 */
AND MP.NM LIKE '%' || #{nm} || '%'
AND MP.RL_NM LIKE '%' || #{rlNm} || '%'
ORDER BY MP.NM ASC
